Karaku ba karaku wata, rakaraka kesana kamonai, pipiya asi five sina mamana wai, sina keyauwarisi. Ruwamo asi tonu sini abiyisi, ba tonu asi ruwamo sini abiyisi.

Kosi sina keyauwarisi wai, tama natuna sebare ini abiyei, ba sebare tamana ini abiyei. Sina natuna wasikena ini abiyei, ba wasike sinana ini abiyei. Ba sina rawana wasikena ini abiyei, ba wasike kaowana sinana ini abiyei.”
Ba yebo pipiya korotosi kurisi i wona, “Maranai guba enaga sipunai egegai ko kitakitai wai, mara kesana ko wonawona ina kusana, ba e kusakusana.
Ba maranai, sibe kariwabo yai everavera damina ko yuyauni wai, ko wonawona ina boborabora, ba e booborabora.
Kwarukwarumimi! komi sapama ba dobu kasi kinanai wai, mara kobi sisiyei. Ba awaika kairavina karaku niko mara basuna kega ko kuiri?
Awaika kairavina kega kebi buibuiya meyim, kata abi wose wai wose gairena.

Maranai kam abiya ina urabaim, bi buibuiyim kairavina kona nenae wai, ke wose rubai kata keta dobonai ami nuwabadona kona bo bitotori, ba koni kwainana. Ba kega wai, ina taina seserim kona nae bi buibuiya bitana kurina. Ba bi baibuiya bitana patuma sebarena ku yarona ina terim, ba patuma sebarena ku patuma yovena ina tere riuwim.
A wonewonim kega rubana patuma yovena kuna kasibau taveyei yepo, kam kunumaka maisana kuna bokoboi wai damaina.”
Kona maranai, pipiya mutusi nai simamana wai, Iesu si wonei kata Galilee biyisi mutusi God kurina si puyopuyo bunuwa wai, Pilate i kasibunuwana, ba tarasi asi puyobunuwa yabata i saretabira.
Iesu ikaobeyisi iwona, “Komi ko nosinosi kata nikosi Galilee biyisi nikasike si rabobo wai, kosi asi piraga goyo sirakata saki, kega bage Gallilee biyisi tupasi rutainisi kona?
Kega, saba ana wonimi, komi ami piraga goyowai koni nuwa birabira wai damanina. Ba kega wai, komi yabata kona rabobo.

Ba nakosi pipiya asi eighteen, Saloam yai yove kaidagimina i peku ikasibunuisi wai kosi mekabage. Ko nosinosi kata kosi asi piragagoyo si rakata saki, kega bage pipiya ereonowasi Jerusalem yai te mamana wai, rutainisi kona?
Ana wonimi kega, saba ereonowami ami piraga goyowai koni nuwabirabira wai damaina. Ba kega wai, komi yebo ereonowami kona rabobo.”
Damanina Iesu niko bi maibai i sisiya i wona, “Sebare kesana koveya keyamina ana wine baona kamonai i baoni. Ba inae koveya uwana pokeina kairavina, saba uwana kega kesana ipanani.
Ana bao kana aba potapota sebarera kurina i wona, karaku bodu tonu ai nebira niko ku koveya keyamina, saba kega kesana uwana a kitai pasika. Ke tara taveyei! awaika kairavina tano wata ebi yakwarei.
Saba bao kana aba potapota sebarena i wona, Bada, bodu kesanaikei wata ke boterei ina mana, kunukununa ana sutabuni ba tano kana bi gairena ana terei
Ba no bodunai ina uwa wai damainina, ba kega wai, kata ana tara taveyei.”
Sabbath kesana, Jew biyisi asi duvu yovena kamonai Iesu ibi beyebeyena.
Ba wasike kesana kanuma goyona i gubagi wai, nai i mamana. Kona wasikena wai bodu eighteen i sikena bonei, ba ririwana i taina rukumi, ba kega rubana iti imsiri totora.
Maranai, Iesu wasikena i kinanai wai i yorei, ba kurina i wona. “Wasike kam gubaga i yawasa.”
Damanina yarona ku tepana i terei, ba mara kesana i msiri totora, ba God ibo kabakabari.

Jew biyisi asi duvu yovena badana i yagisi, basuna Iesu Sabbath maranai ba pipiya i yawasi. Kona kairavina pipiya kurisi i wona, “Saibira kasi mara wai asi six, kosi marasi yai wai kona botu biyawasa kairavina, ba kega Sabbath maranai.”
Niko wasike wai Abraham natuna, ba Satan i kaupatupatumi bodu eighteen i kakaba. Kata sabbath maranai tana tombauni kona kega?”
Iesu nikasike i sisiya wai kana abiya si sinimaya. Saba pipiya wai, wose kaimasavisi i wose kairavina si nuwagaire.
Iesu i toiruba i wona, God ana Basileiya wai, mekabage, mekabage ana tere gubai?
Kona wai nikasike, sebare kesana mustard pesina i yauni ba ana bao kamonai i baoni. Mastard i rautiti i gae i keyama, ba manu ragaraganai kasi nigu si bowa.
Ba i toiruba mena i wona, “God ana Basileiya awaika yabata ana tere gubai?
Kona wai nikasike, maranai wasike yeast yogina mom i yauni, ba flour kaikapona yabata i tabiri. Ba i terei i mana flour i ruruwa wai, rutainina.”
Iesu i bomsiri ku Jerusalem i nenae wai, keta dobonai meyaga kaikaposi, ba yogiyogisi kamosi yai ibi beyebeyena, ba i nenae.
Ba pipiya kesana i toirubai i wona, “Bada, pipiya kega pesarisi yawasa mama damanina sina yauni kona?”
Iesu i kaobeyisi i wona, “Ko wose rubai kata matamketa kiudunai kona riu. Basuna pipiya pesarisi sina wose rubai kata sina riu, saba kega rubarubana.

Maranai yove badana ina bomsiri, ba matamketa ina gudui wai, komi matarai koni imsiri ba kona rau kesakesara.” Ba koni bi baba kona wona wona, “Bada matamketa kairavikai kuta botaveyei.” Saba kona ina kaobeyimi ina wona, “Komi kega a kuirimi, memena ko botu?”
Ba komi kona wona, “Kom rorowa yabata ta kam ba ta toma, ba ama meyagai kui beyebeyena.”
Kona maranai, pipiya kupura ereonowanai sina botu. God ana ku Basileiya. Ba poraga kamonai, asi gawara sina yauna sina makira.
Damanina ba iyabosi karaku tebi nao wai sini muri, ba iyabosi karaku tebi muri wai sini nao.”
Kona maranai giugiu bitasi mutusi si botu Iesu kurina, ba si wonei, si wona, “Niko kupura ke kasibau taveyei ke nesaira, basuna Herod ana waina ina kasibunuim.”
Iesu i kaobeyisi i wona, “Ko nae nao kukou garagara ko wonei, kata karaku ba maram kanuma goyogoyosi ani kasibaunisi ba gubagubagisi ani yawasisi. Ba kao bi tonuinai au saibira ani kakabi.
Bagunai wata mekabage, saba karaku, maram, ba mara bi tonuinai awaika a wosewosei wai ana bo koboi. Kega kesana God ana Peroveta memena ina rabobo saba Jerusalem kamonai wata ina rabobo.

Ae kiwaiape Jerusalem, Jerusalem, kom peroveta pesarisi kui kasibunuwana, ba God ana kawari yonayona kurim i poraisi wai, akimai kui guda bunuwana. Mara i pesara saki a waini kata am pipiya ereonowasi ati kesanisi, bage kokorereko sinasi, mapemapenai natunatuna e tapitapi ragaunisi wai, rutainina. Saba kom kega am waina.
Ke kinani, kona kairavina wai, am yove tapaoro kwebuna ina mana. Abi suwonim kom kega kuna kinakinaniku yepo maranai kuna wona, “Bibi gairenina kotoi bada wabanai e botubotu.”
Sabbath kesana, Iesu i nae Pharisee biyisi asi bada kesana ana yoveyai ita kam, ba pipiya wai, Iesu sibo kibukibu kabitamni.
Ba sebare kesana yaroyarona ba kaekaena sibo ruruwana wai nai Iesu naonai i mamana.
Iesu Pharisee ba kairuwana kuira biyisi i toirubaisi, i wona, “Ata giu mekabage e wonawona, Sabbath maranai tani yawasa kona kega?”
Saba kosi kega kesana awaika si sisiyei, damanina sebarena i yauni i yawasi, ba i pora taveyei.
Saba kega kesana kotoi nikona kairavina i kaobeyei.
Maranai pipiya gawara kaimatanisi si bobine Iesu i kinani wai, niko bi maibai ereonowasi kurisi i sisiya.
I wona, “Maranai tabine kamna kairavina sina yorim wai, kega pipiya kaikaiposi asi gawarai ke makira. Memei bage pipiya bi badana kesana, kega kom rutainim yebo si yorei.
Kona kairavina nao sebare komi ami ruamo i yorimi wai, ina botu ba ina wona, “Am aba makimakira niko sebare ke berei.” Damanina kom kuni sinimaya ba gawara mominai kuna makira.

Saba maranai sina yorim wai, ke nae gawara mominai ke makira. Ba nao pipiya kotai i yorim wai, ina botu maranai ina wona, “Kwaina ke magae ku gawara gairena.” Damanina pipiya si yorisi wai ereonowasi matasi yai sina kao bi gegaenim.
Kairavina iyabosi wata te teretere geyana meyisi wai ereonowasi ina tere kireisi. Ba iyabosi wata te teretere kirana meyisi wai, ina bokabarisi.

Damanina Iesu kam badana kurina i wona, “Maranai kao basuna kamna, kona rabisi kamna kuna wosei wai, kega turaturam ba tuwa teiteim, kona am rakaraka, kona maturaturam marimariyisi kuna yorisi sina kam. Kairavina kosi yebo sina yorim, ba awaika ku wosei wai sini sarobi.
Saba kam kaikapona kuna wosei wai pipiya moyamoyakisi, ba sikesikenisi, ba mata potapotasi, ba digadigasi ke yorisi sina kam
Kosi pipiyisi karaku wata kega sina sarobim, saba God ini gairenim. Ba pipiya asi yawasa totorisi sina bomsiri mena maranai. God ini maisanim.”
Iesu i kobeyei i wona, “Mara kesana, sebare kesana kam kaikapo sakina i tupuvi, ba pipiya pesarisi i yorisi.”
Ba kamna marana i neratui wai, ana saibisaibirina i porai i nae pipiya iyabosi i yorisi wai, kurisi ita wonisi, “Ko botu sawara ereonowana ka bobunagi i kakaba.”
Saba kosi ereonowasi si dagui asi sisiya si teretere sisirana. Pipiya i nao wai i wona, “Au tano karaku wata mom a gimoni, ba a nenae ana kitai, abi babaimi ko boteriku.”
Kesana i wona, “Yauku karaku wata mom au bullock asi ten a gimonisi. Ba a kasikasibau ana raurubaisi, sina bagibagi kabitam kona kega. Abi babaimi ko boteriku.”
Yebo kesana i wona, “Yauku karauku wata mom a tabine, kona kairaina kega rubana ana botu.”

Aba sabisaibirina i veramaga, ba awaika si sisiyei wai, ereonowana ana bada i wonei. Ana bada i yagisi wai i wona, “Yagiyagina ke kasibau, ba meyaga kamonai keta badai, ba keta soesoesiyai pipiya moyamoyakisi ba sikesikenisi, ba mata potapotasi ba digadigasi, ke urabaisi kona botu.”
Kega rabarabana ba saibisaibirina i wona, “Bada awaika ku wona wai a wosei, ba saba gawara tupana i madamana.”
Damanina ana bada i wona, “Ke kasibau meyaga ku kupuna ba keta kaikaposi yai ba soesoesi yai pipiya ke wonisi sina riu au yove sini bonuvei.”
Ana wonimi, iyabosi wata a yorisi ba si totoyana wai, kega kesana au kam ina kam rubai.
Mara kesana, koroto kaikapona Iesu yabata si yewo si nenae ba, i taibira ba kurisi i wona.
Kotoi wata ina botu kuriku, ba saba tamana ba sinana, ba nobuna ba tuwateina, ba yebo i kesina ana yawasa kega ini sinikikiyei wai, kona kega au nonorayauna.
Ba kotoi wata ana korosi kega ina kabari, ba ini saununuriku wai, kona kega au nonorayauna.
Kom kotoi wata am waina yove kaidagimina bowaina kairavina wai, kainaona kuna makira, ba maisana kuna kai rubai. Kata bi suwona money rubana, ba yovena kuni kakabi kona kega?
Saba tukeke wata kuni totorana, ba yovena kega kuni kakabi wai, pipya ereonowasi sina kitai wai sini namim.
Sina wona, niko sebare yove bowaina i dagui, saba kega rubana ini kakabi.

Ba taupauma kesana ina tauya taupauma kesana yabata bi abiya kairavina wai, kainaona ina makira ba ini nuwa notanota. Rubarubanana ana abiyabiyisi asi ten thousand, ba kana abiya ana abiyabiyisi asi twenty thousand ini imsi beyisi kona?
Ba kega rubarubanana wai, kana abiya rabarabai ina botubotu maranai, ana kawari yonayona ini poraisi sina nae nuwanuba kairavina sini babai.
Iesu ana sisiya ibo koboi ba i wona, “Kesanina komi, kotoi wata sawara ereonowasi kega ini sinikikiyana wai, kega rubana ini sununuriku. Ba kona wai kega au nonorayauna.”
Enaga wai gairena, ba maranai enaga damina ina kakaba wai, kega rubana tana wosei ini enaga mena.
Kona wai kega i gaire, kata tano kana bibi gairena kukamona tana terei bao kairavina. Kona tano kurina wai i goyo, ba ku boga tani utusewa taveyei. Komi ere tainami wai, ko nonora.
Mara kesana tax aba yuyauna biyisi ba piraga goyo pipiyisi si botu Iesu siti taina baenegei.
Saba Pharisee biyisi ba giugiu bitasi si dagui si gwinigwini “Niko sebare piraga goyo pipiyisi ebi turaturanisi, ba yabata te kamkam.”
Kata Iesu niko bi maibai kurisi i sisiya.

I wona, “Memena bage komi kesana ana sheep asi hundred ba kesana iti siwani wai, awaika ita wosei? Nakoi sheep asi ninty-nine kwapu kamonai iti sumarisi, ba nao kesanaikei i siwana wai, ita nuvenuveni yepo ita panani.
Ba ita panani wai, ere nuwa gairenina ku kabarana ita terei ba ita kabari,
ba ita veramaga ana ku yove.” Damanina turaturana ba maturaturana ita yorisi ba ita wona, “Au sheep i siwana wai a panani, kairavina abi nuwagaire, ko botu tani nuagaire.”
A wonewonimi, kesanina yebo nanakasike, piraga goyo pipiyina kesana ikei ini nuwabirabira wai, sapamai kairavina nuwagaire ina rakata saki. Kega bage pipya gaigairesi asi ninety-nine.

Kona memena bage wasike kesana, ana money asi ten ba kesana iti siwani wai, awaika ita wosei? Kibe ita kapuni ba ana yove ita rubunagi, ba kupura ereonowana ita nuvena kabikabitamni yepo ita panani wai damaina.
Ba ina panani maranai, turaturana ba warewaresina ina yorisi, ba ina wona, “Kobotu, au money kesana ai siwani wai a panani kairavina tani nuwagaire.”
A wonewonimi, kesanina yebo nanakasike piraga goyo pipiyina kesana ikei ini nuwabirabira wai, kairavina God ana aneya sini nuwagaire.
Iesu sisiya i tere damadamanei i wona, “Mara kesana sebare natunatuna sabasebare asi ruwamo yabata si mamana.”
Ba natuna murimurina i wona, “Tama, yauku kau koda buderi sawarisi, karaku nina ke beriku. Damanina ba ana sawara natunatuna asi ruamo i kodeisi.”
Kega rabarabana, ba natuna murimurina ana sawara i gimogimona, ba i kasibau taveyana i nae ku kupura rabaraba. Ba namai, ana money ereonowana i garuroboi.
Ana money i kakabi murinai wai, nao kupura kamonai gomara kaikapona i tupuwa. Ba kona karinai wai kega kesana awaika i mamana.
Damanina ba i nae nao kupura pipiyina marimariyina kesana, kairavina ita bagibagi. Ba nao kupura pipiyina, i porai i nae ana poro ita potaisi.
Ba soya i raobo saki wai, ana waina kata poro kasi kam kwapirisi ita kam, basuna kega kesana kotoi kam i berei.
Kona maranai, nota kurina i botu, ba i wona, “Tamaku ana saibisaibirisi ereonowasi ebi maisanisi, ba kasi kam i rakata saki, ba yauku nina soya a raboraobo.
Ana bomsiri ana veramaga tamaku kurina, ba ana wona, tama, kom ba God kurimi piraga goyo awosei.
Yauku kega damaniku ba kuna yoriku natum, gwabimi yai ana bagibagi am sabisabirisi kesana rutainina.”
Damanina ba i bomsiri i veramaga tamana kurina. Kega i verakasibau ku yove, ba rabarabai naki tamana i kinana i kitai wai i nuwapoyei. I vera i kasibau natuna i tararausi ba i yaoni.”
Ba natuna i wona, “Tama yauku kona kom ba God kurimi piraga goyo a wosei, yauku kega damaniku ba kuna yoriku natum.”
Saba tamana ana saibisaibirisi kurisi i para i wona, “Yagiyaginai kwama monimonikina natuku koi kotei, ba ring ku yaro rakorakona ko terei. Ba kae sumasuma ku kaena koi kotei.
Ba ko nae cow natuna bi kam potana ko kasibunui, ba ereonowata kam kai kapona tana wosei, ba tani nuagaire.
Kairavina niko natuku sebare i rabobo ba i yawasa, i siwana ba a panani, ba damanina kam kaikapona si dagui si bobunagi.”
Kona maranai, natuna iyarokona wai kwapu kamonai i bobagibagi yepo i veraveramaga ku yove. Ba maranai i botu ku yove gwabina wai, inaba gugurina ba pipiya si rikuriku wai i nonorisi.
Damanina aba saibisaibirina kesana i yorei, ba i toirubai i wona, “Awaika e tuputupuwa?”
Ba saibisaibirina i kaobeyei i wona, “Teimkikei i veramaga mena ku yove. Ba teimkikei sinina gairena, ba yawayawasina i veramaga kairavina, tamam cow natuna bi kampotana i kasibunui.”
Damanina tuwana i yagisi saki, wai kega i riu ku yove kamona. Ba tamana i kasibau i babai kata ita riu.

Saba i totoyana, ba tamana i kaobeyei i wona, “Ke kinani, nikosi bodu pesarisi patupatumisi rutainina kairavim abo bagibagi, ba kega meyanai gamom ai kawakasekasyei. Ba awaika gairena kairaviku ku wosei? Kega gote natuna wata ku beriku, turaturaku yabata ka kam ba kai nuwagaire.
Saba niko natum, am sawara bibaine kakaiwakisi kurisi i berena paraparagana. Ba i veramaga ku yove wai, cow natuna bi kam potana kairavina ku kasibunui.”
Tamana i kaobeyei i wona, “Natuku, kom wai mamanina gwabikuwai ke mamana, ba au sawara ereonoana wai, kom karimi yai.
Saba tati nuagaire, ba yata sita sisira basuna, niko teim i rabobo, ba i yawasa, i siwana, ba tapanana meyei.
Iesu ana nonora yauna i wonisi i wona, “Sebare marimariyina kesana, pipipya si botu si wonei, kata ana sawara kasi aba potapota pipiyina wai, ana sawara i resoreso bi garugaruwana.”
Damanina i yorei i botu kurina, ba i wona, “Niko, sisiyim mekabage a noonori, ki mamatariku ana kuiri, kata kom mekabage au sawara ke potapotai. Basuna, kom kega au sawara kuna pota mena.”
Ba sawara kasi aba potapota nuwasinenai i wona, “Au bada au saibirai ebi rukaibuviku ba awaika ana wosei? Yauku kega maragasiku ba tano ana karoi ba abi sinimaya kega rubana ani kawa kinana.”
I wona, “A kuiri awaika ana wosei kata, ana rukaibau maranai wai, turaturaku sina urabaiku asi ku yove mena.”

Damanina ba, pipiya ereonowasi ana bada ana sawara si yauna mom, ba kega si maisani wai, i yorisi si botu. Ba pipiya i nao i botu wai i toirubai i wona, “Kom au bada gwabinai kam taraboga biyamo wata te mamana?”
I kaobeyei i wona, “Yauku olive oil eight hundred gallons a yauni.” Ba sawara aba potapota sebarena i wona, “Nina am paper ke yauni ba yagiyagina ke birai, ke kirumi four hundred gallons wata.”

Ba pipiya bai ruwaina kurina i wona, “Ba kom, au bada gwabinai kam taraboga biyamo te mamana?” I kaobeyei i wona, “Yauku flour begs asi thousand a yanisi.” Sawara aba potapota sebarena i wona, “Nina am paper ke yauni ba ke birai ke kirumi eight hundred wata.
Sebare marimariyina ana sawara kasi aba potapota kwarukwarumina ana bi kose kairavina ikao bi gegaeni. Basuna niko dobu pipiyisi wai, si kose saki kega bage yasegana pipiyisi.
Iesu i wona, “Niko dobu ana mari yai pipiya ki turaturanisi kata marana ina netaveyei wai komi sapamai sina verabeyim ba sini kaikaivim.
Kotoi wata sawara soesoesi yai kega sini tumaganei wai yebo sawara kaikaposi yai kega sini tumaganei. Ba kotoi wata sawara soesoesi yai ina kwaruma wai yebo sawara kaikaposi yai ina kwaruma.
Memena bage kom niko dobu mariyina kairavina kega tebi tumaganim wai, awaika kairavina mariya damana kairavina sini tumaganim.
Ba pipiya asi sawara potaisi kairavina kega sini tumaganeim wai kega kesana kotoi sawara ina berim kuni karimi yai.”
Pharisee biyisi nikona si nonori wai, Iesu si kao bibisakei, basuna kosi money si nuwayauyauni.

Iesu i wona, “Komi pipiya matasi yai ko wosewose bage komi pipiya gairemi, ba saba God nuwanuwami i kuiri.” Kairavina abi sawara pipiya te nosinosi kurisi sawara kaikapona wai God kurina wai mo’omosina.
Sapama ba dobu rubana sina momosa, saba Moses ana kao tunetune kega rubana soesoena ikei wata ina momosa.
Meo sebare wata kaowana ini gesei ba wasike kesana bauna ina rabai wai, kona e raukaipara. Ba meo sebare wasike bi bi sairina ina rabai wai, kona yebo e raukaipara.
Mara kesana, namai sebare marimariyina kesana i mamana. Mara patepatena gara monimonikisi yai i kau bunaga, ba ibi mayawana.
Ba namai yebo sebare moyamoyakina kesana, kana waba Lazarus, sinina ereonowana gubaga si bonuvi ba i mamana. Pipiya si kabakabari si botubotu sebare marimariyina ana matam ketai si tereterei.
I bi potapota kata, sebare marimariyina ana aba kamkam tepanai, kam pinipinimisi sita peku wai, ita kam. Ba yebo kukou si botubotu ba kana gubaga si remoremo.
Mara i botu wai, sebare moyamoyakina i rabobo ba aneya kanumina si yauni si gae Abraham parinai si makirei. Ba sebare marimariyina yebo i rabobo, ba si dogui,
ba kanumina i nae rabobo ku gawarina. Namai, sini yara kamonai i gagawa, ba rabarabai naki Abraham i kitai, ba parinai wai Lararus i mamana.

Ba Abraham kurina i yore i wona “Tama Abraham, ki kamyosukuviku, ba Larzarus ki porai yaro rakorakonai okowai ina kutubi, ba pepeku ini nubanubai. Basuna yauku niko keyama kaikarakarasina kamonai, sini yara kaikaponai a mamana.”
Saba Abraham i kaobeya i wona, “Natuku, ke nosi kata yawayawasim maranai, kom am sawara gairesi ku yauna, ba Lazarus sawara goyosi i yauna, saba karaku kom siniyara kamonai, ba kona ebi nuwagaire.

Ba kesana wai kawana sanagina kaikapona kom ba yakai basuti yai e mamana, kata iyabosi nimai kurimi nae asi waina wai, kega rubana sina wosei, kona kega kotoi, memena ke mamana wai ini garubona kurikai.”
Sebare marimariyina i kaobeya i wona, “Kata tama, abi babaim Lazarus ki porai ina nae tamaku ana ku yove.
Namai tuateiteiku asi five te mamana, ina wonisi sina kuiri kata kosi kega sina botu niko ku siniyara gawarina.”
Abrabam i kaobeya i wona, “Tuwateiteim gwabisi yai wai Moses ba Peroperoveta te mamana, kosi awaika tebi sisiyei wai sina nonori.”
Sebare marimariyina i kaobeya i wona, “Tama Abraham, kona wai kega rubana. Saba pipiya kesana rabobowai ina bomsiri mena ba ina nae kurisi wai sini nuwabirabira.”
Abraham i kaobeya i wona, “Moses ba Peroperoveta gamosi kega sina nonora wai, bagunai wata pipiya kesana rabobowai ina bomsiri mena, saba kega sini nuwabirabira.”
Iesu ana Nonorayauna kurisi i wona, “Mekosi sawara pipiya te wosewosisi tebi piragagoyo wai, sina tupuwa. Saba, kotoi karinai te botubotu wai sarobina ina goyo saki.
I gaire kata kona pipiyina kamyonai akima kaikapona tata kausi ba ku boga tati garukirei. Ba kega nikosi pipiya gunaguna ku goyona iti naovisi.
Kona kairavina ko kita kabitanimi! Tuateim wose goyona ina wosei wai ke kao rumatani. Ba ini nuwabirabira wai ana goyona ke nota taveyei.
Memena bage kao kesana kamonai mara seven wose goyona kurim ita wosei, ba mara seven ita botu ita wona, kurim ita tombaubauni wai, ke nota taveyei.
Ba Apostles Bada kurina si wona, “Ama bi geruwana ki rakasi.”
Memena bage kom am saibisaibirina kwapu kamonai sheep ina potapotaisi kona ina roberobe yepo ina veramaga ku yove wai kuna wona kuna kam kona?
Kona kuna wona kau kamdauwa ke bobunagi. Ba ki kaubunaga ba kuna bo saibiriku ana kam ba ana toma, kona murinai kom kuna kam ba kuna toma.
Aba saibisaibirina ana bada ana waina ereonowana ina wosei saba kega ini kaikaivi.
Nanakasike yebo komi, maranai awaika ereonowana sina wonimi wai kona wosei ina kakaba wai, kona wona “Yakai kona aba saibisaibira mom, ama saibira ka wose wosei.”
Mara kesana, Iesu i tauya ku Jerusalem wai, Samaria ba Galilee biyisi asi bi paraparatai wata i nenae.
Ba ku meyaga kesana iriuriu wai sebasebare asi ten, ereronowasi kasi gubaga leprosy, si verabeyei. Ba rabarabai si msiri.
Ba si parara si wona “Bada Iesu ki nuwanuwanikai!”
Iesu i kinanisi wai i wona, “Ko nae priest kurisi sina bo kinakinanimi.” Ba si nenae wai keta dobonai si yawasa.
Ba kamosi yai sebare kesana, maranai i kinani kata i yawasa wai, i veramaga gamona kaikaponai God i bokabakabari.
Ba Iesu kaenai ku tano i peku ba i kaikaivi. Ba kona sebarena wai, Sameria biyina
Iesu i toiruba i wona, “Pipiya asi ten si yawasa ba asi nine memena?
Awaika kairavina niko pipiya tumana i kesina i veramaga God ebi kaikaivi.
Ba Iesu kurina i wona, “Ke bomsiri ba ke nae, am bi geruwana i yawasim.”
Mara kesana Pharisee biyisi Iesu si toirubai, kata meyana God ana Basileiya ita botu. Iesu i kaobeya i wona, “God ana Basileiya ina botu wai, kega aba kina kinanina.
Kona pipiya sina wona, nina karaku! kona noi karaku! basuna God ana Basileiya wai komi kamomi yai.”
Ba ana Nonorayauna kurisi i wona, “Mara e botubotu kona maranai ami waina kata Sebare Natuna kota kinani, saba kega kona kinani.
Kairavina, Sebare Natuna ana botuna marana wai bage guba ebo kadari rutainina. Ebo kadari wai sapama erau yasegana e nenae ku sepina.
Saba kainaona niko kimta sini sinikikiyei, ba sini nomosa kaikapona ina yauni.
Sebare Natuna ana botu marana wai, kesanina bage Noah ana marai.
Pipiya ereonowasi si kamkam ba si tomatoma, ba sibi tabitabine yepo, Noah i riu ku waka mena. Ba damanina kutukutuba i botu ba ereonowasi ikasi baigoyonisi.
Kesanina nanakasike yebo Lot ana marai. Pipiya si tomatoma ba si kamkam, sibi gimogimona, ba si bobao ba si bowabowa.
Saba maranai Lot meyaga kana waba Sodom i kasibau taveyei wai, keyama kai karakarasina ba akima boraborasi sapamai si peku, ba pipiya ereonowasi ikasi baigoyonisi.
Nanakasike yebo, maranai Sebare Natuna ina rerematara wai marana.

Kona maranai kotoi wata ana yove wada kupuna tepanai ina mamana wai, kega rubana ina gakira ku yove kamona ana sawara ina yauna. Kesanina yebo, kotoi wata kwapu kamonai ina mamana wai, kega rubana ina veramaga ana ku yove awaika kesana kairavina.
Lot kaowana ko nosi.
Kotoi wata ina wose rubai ana yawasa botawanina kairavina wai, ini siwani. Ba kotoi wata ana yawasa ini siwani wai, ini yawasi.
A wonewonim, kona pominai pipiya ruamo aba dudauwa gawarina kesanai sina dudauwa, kesana ina yauna taveyei ba kesana wata ina mana.
Bibaine asi ruwamo pegapega sina gudagudai, kesana ina yauna taveyei ba kesana wata ina mana.”
Sebasebare ruwamo kwapu kamonai, kesana ina yauna taveyei ba kesana ina mana.
Ana Nonorayauna si toirubai si wona, “Bada memena?” I kaobeya i wona, “pipiya raboraobona memena e mamana wai namai poyake sina notuwa.
I wona, “Meyaga kesana kamonai, bi buibuiya bitana kesana i mamana kona wai, God kega i naganagarei, ba pipiya kega i bokuwayisi.”
Ba kona meyagina kamonai wai, yebo sobere kesana i mamana, ba mamanina i botubotu ibi babai, i wonawona, “Ki baisiku kau abiya yabata ama bi kawapata kuna bo bitotori.”
Saba mara pesarina bi buibuiya bitana niko sobere ana bibaba i to’otoyanei. Yepo mara kesana, nuwasinenai i nuwasuya i wona, “Bagunai wata God kega a naganagarei, ba pipiya kega a bokuwayisi.
Saba, niko sobere ebi sinikaina sakiyiku kairavina, awaika e waiwaini wai, ana bo bi totori. Ba kega ana wosei wai, ini sinikaina sakiyiku.”
Ba Bada i wona, “Bi buibuiya kwarukwarumina awaika i sisiyei wai, ko nonori?
God ana pipiya binebinesi kao ba pom kurina te tutou wai, ini buibuiya kabitam ba yawasa totorina ina berisi kona? Ba kega ini baita yaginisi kona?
A wonewonimi, ina kinana kabitamni kata, awaika te waiwaini wai yagiyagina wata sina yauni. Saba, Sebare Natuna ina botu maranai wai, dobuwai bi geruwana ina panani kona?”
Pipiya mutusi asi gairena si notanota tepanisi, ba pipiya ereonowasi si kitakita kireisi wai, niko bi maibai Iesu kurisi i sisiyei.
I wona, “Mara kesana sebasebare asi ruwamo, si nae ku yove taparoro rupari kairavina. Kesana wai Pharisee ba kesana, wai, tax aba yauyauna biyina.

Pharisee biyina i msisaira, ba i kesina kairavina i rupari. i wona, “God abi kaikaivim kata yauku kega sebasebare mutusi rutainisi kosi wai, pisipisikarisi, matamataisigisi, kwarukwarumisi, ba rurukaiparisi kona niko tax aba yuyauna sebarena rutinina.
Yauku taparoro kesakesasike kamosi yai abi siya kao ruamo, ba awaika ereonowana a yuyani wai, asi ten kamonai kesana God a bereberei.”
Saba tax aba yuyauna sebarena rabarabainaki i msiri, ba kega rubana ita gagawa ku sapama. Saba nuwanuwana i ravi ba i wona, “God ki nuwanuwaniku, yauku piraga goyo pipiyiku.”

A wonewonimi, tax aba yuyauna sebarena ana piraga goyo ereonowana, God i nota taveyei ba kega Pharisee. Pipiya ereonowasi sina bokabara meyisi wai, God ina tere kireisi. Ba pipiya iyabosi te teretere kireina meyisi wai, ina bokabarisi.
Pipiya yebo pepeya si yauna si botubotu, Iesu yaronai ita borubaisi kairavina. Ba maranai ana Nonorayauna nikona si kinani wai, si yegaisi.

Saba Iesu pipiya gunaguna i yorisi si botu kurina, ba i wona, “Pipiya gunaguna ko boterisi sina botu kuriku, ba kega koni gesisi. Kairavina, pipiya, nikosi pipiya gunaguna rutainisi wai, kosi God ana Basileiya karisi yai.”
Abi suwonimi, kotoi wata God ana Basileiya, kega pipiya gunaguna rutainisi ina yauni wai, kega meyana ina riu ku kamona.
Iesu i kaobeyei i wona, “Awaika kairavina ku yoriku gaireku, kega kesana kotoi gairena, saba God i kesina wata gairena.
God wonana ku kuiri? Kega ke rukaipara, kega ke kasibunuwa, kega ke pisikara, kega pipiya kesana ki sisiyana kwarumei, ba tamam ba sinam ke kao baisiyeisi.”
Sebarena i kaobeya i wona, “Yauku yogiyogikuwai ba i botu karaku, nikosi wona ereonowasi abo sisiriyana.”

Iesu nikona i nonori maranai wai, kurina i wona, “Wose kesana wata kuna wosei, am sawara ereonowana ki gimonei ba moneyna pipiya moyamoyakisi ke berisi, ba am mariya sapamai kuna yauni. Ba ke botu kuni sununuriku.”
Saba kona i nonori wai, i nuwapoya saki, basuna kona wai i mariya saki.
Iesu sebarena i kitai kata ibi nuwapoya wai, i wona, “God ana Basileiya riunina kairavina wai, pipiya marimariyisi kurisi ina padapada.
Abi suwonimi, God ana Basileiya riu boneina kairavina pipiya marimariyina kurina i padapada saki. Kega bage camel siu niponina ina riu bonei rutainina.”
Pipiya nikona si nonori wai, si toirubai si wona, “Kata iyabosi wata yawasa mamadamanina sina yauni?”
Iesu i kaobeya i wona, “Awaika pipiya kurisi i padapada wai, God kurina kega i padapada.”
Peter Iesu kurina i wona, “Yakai ama sawara ereonowasi kai sumamarana, ba kom ka kibikibim.”
Iesu kurisi i wona, “A bisuwonimi, kotoi wata God ana Basileiya kairavina ana yove ba kaowana, kona tuwateiteina, kona natunatuna, ba tutununa ini sumarisi wai,
puyo kaikapo sakina ina yauni, niko maranai. Ba mara damonai yawasa mamadamanina ina yauni.”
Sina patumi, pipiya bausi ku yarosi sina terei. Kosi sini namei, sini gigimi, sina kanui, sina kwapui, ba sina kasibunui.
Saba mara bi tonuinai ina bomsiri mena.
Saba ana nonora yauna nikona si subi buruburuvei. Kurisi wai basuna i buniyei, ba awaika i bi sisiyei wai kega si kuiri.”
Iesu i veravera kasibau ku Jericho maranai, sebare mata potapotana kesana keta parinai i makira i mamana ba ibi kawakinana.
Ba maranai i nonori kata pipiya korotosi parinai si yewo si nenae wai, i toirubaisi i wona, “Awaika etuputupuwa?”
Si wonei si wona, “Iesu Nazareth biyina i yewo e nenae.”
I para i wona, “Iesu David Natuna! ki kamyosukuviku.”
Pipiya keta sibi naovei wai sebare mata potapotana si yegai, ba si wonei kata kawana ita pota. Saba kona gamona kaikaponai i para tupetupena i wona, “David Natuna ki nuanuaniku!”
Iesu i msiri, ba pipiya i wonisi kata sebare mata potapotana sita botuvei kurina. Maranai i botu Iesu ku parina wai, Iesu sebarena i toirubai,
I wona, “Am waina awaika kairavim ana wosei?” Sebarena i kaobeya i wona, “Bada au waina ani kinana.”
Iesu kurina i wona, “Ki kinana, am bi geruwana i yawasim.”
Yagiyagina wata sebarena i kinana, ba Iesu i saununuri, God i bokabakabari ba Pipiya ereonowasi si kinani wai, kosi yabata God si bokabakabari.
Iesu i riu ku Jericho, ba kamonai i yewo i nenae.
Ba kona meyaginai, sebare kesana, kana waba Zacchaeus i mamana. Kona wai tax aba yuyauna biyisi asi bada kesana, ba sebare marimariyina.
Ana waina mekabage, ba Iesu ita kinani. Saba kega rubana, basuna kona wai i dubodubo saki, ba pipiya korotosi si imsi papari.
Kona kairavina i vera i nao i nae, ba keyama kana waba sikamo i gaeni. Kata Iesu kona ketanai i botubotu wai, ita kinani.
Iesu i botu kona ku gawarina maranai, i gagawa, ba kurina i wona, “Zacchaeus, ke gakira yagiyagina, karaku am yoveyai ana mana.”
Damanina Zacchaeus yagiyagina wata i gakira, ba ere nuwagairena Iesu i kaikaivi, ba i urabai i nae ana ku yove.
Iesu kurina i wona, “Karaku yona yawasa i botu niko ku yove, basuna niko sebare wai yebo kona Abraham natuna.
Kairavina, Sebare Natuna i botu pipiya siwasiwanisi ina nuvenisi ba ini yawasisi.”

Pipiya nikona sibi taina baenegei maranai, Iesu ana sisiya i tubotaini, ba bi maibai kurisi i sisiya. Basuna matapa i botu Jerusalem ku gwabina, ba pipiya si nosinosi kata, God ana Basileiya mara kesana ita rerematara.

Iesu i wona, “Mara kesana, sebare marimariyina kesana i mamana, kona wai pipiya kaimatanina. Ba mara kesana, i tauya ita bowagawaga, ku rabaraba kupura kesana. Ba namai pipiya maragata sita berei kata bi taupauma kairavina, ba yebo ita veramaga mena.
Muriyai ita tauya wai, ana saibisaibirisi asi ten i yoriisi, ba kesakesasike wata gold ibo pataisi i berisi. Ba i wona, “Nikosi money ko taura sina bobagibagi yepo ana veramaga.
Saba ana pipiya si sinikikiyei wai kairavina, i nae ba murinai wara si porai si wona “Niko sebare kega ama waina kurikai ini Taupauma.

Saba sebarena si wosei i Taupauma, ba i veramaga mena ana ku yove. Ba ana saibisaibirisi money i berisi wai, asi wara i porai sita botu, ba karisiyai ita kuiri kata, ana money mekabage wata si wosei.”
Ana saibisaibirina kesana i nao i botu wai i wona, “Bada am gold kesana ku beriku wai yebo ten tepanai a wosei”.
Ana bada i kaobeyei i wona, “Kuwose kabitamni, kom aba saibisaibira gairem. Sawara soesoena ku wose kabitamni kairavina meyaga kaikaposi ten ana berim kuni badisi.
Ana saibisaibirina kana bi ruwamo i botu ba i wona, “Bada am gold nina, ku tepana yebo yaro sepina a wosei.”
Ana bada i kaobeyei i wona, “Kom meyaga kaikaposi yaro sepina ki badisi.”
Ba ana saibisaibirina kesana yebo i botu kurina, ba i wona, “Bada am gold ku beriku wai nina, garai a sumai ba ai buneyei i mamana.
A nagarim, basuna kom sebare padapadam, kom awaika kega ku tereterei wai ke yuyauni, ba awaika kega ku bobaoni wai ke bo’oyauna.”

Ana bada i kaobeyei i wona, “Kom aba saibisaibira kawakasekasem, kom i kesim am sisiyai ani buibuiyim. Ku kuiri kata yauku sebare padapadaku, awaika kega a terei wai a yuyauni, ba awaika kega a baoni wai a bo’oyauna.
Awaika kairavina au money kega ku terei i bagibagi? Kata a veramaga wai yebo yogina tepanai ata yauni.”
Damanina pipiya nai parinai simsimsiri wai, kurisi i wona, “Gold karinai ko yauna taveyei, ba ko nae nao saibisabirina karinai gold asi ten te mamana wai ko berei.”
Saba kosi si wona, “Bada, kona wai gwabinai matapa gold asi ten te mamana.”

Taupauma i kaobeya i wona, “Pipiya iyabosi wata gwabisi yai sawara pesarisi te mamana wai, yebo tepanai ana berisi ani pesari. Ba saba, iyabosi wata gwabisi yai kega kesana awaika emamana wai, awaika yogina ikei gwabisi yai e mamana wai, ana yauna taveyei.
Ba nakosi kau abiya, iyabosi kega asi waina yauku ati Taupauma wai, ko yaunisi ko botu nina naokuwai koni kasibunuwana.”
Iesu nikona i sisiyei i kakaba wai, i tauya i nao i gegae ku Jerusalem.
Ba maranai i botu Bethphage, ba Bethany meyagisi ku gwabisi, koya kana waba Olives tepanai ana Nonorayauna ruwamo i poraisi si nao. Ba kurisi i wona,
“Koi nao ko nae nao ku meyaga naoti yai. Ba kona riuriu wai, donkey natuna nigonigorina kona kinani. Kega meyana pipiya kesana i geru ku tepana. Ko tombubauni ba ko yauni ko botu nikei.
Ba memena bage kotoi wata ina toirubaimi ina wona, “Awaika kairavina ko tombubauni? Ko wonei ko wona, Bada e waiwaini.”
Pipiysi iyabosi wata i poraisi si nae wai, awaika wata Iesu i wonisi wai nanakasike i tupuwa si kinani.
Ba donkey kana nigora si tombubauni maranai, donkey babadisi si toirubaisi si wona, “Awaika kairavina donkey ko tombubauni?”
Kosi saba si kaobeyisi si wona, “Bada e waiwaini.”
Damanina si yauni si nae Iesu kurina, ba kasi gara ku tepana si garu gegeyana, ba Iesu donkey ku tepana si gerui.
Iesu i geru i nenae wai, pipiya kasi tarasowo si botavetaveyana ba naonai ketai si yabara.
Ba i botu Olive koyana ita gakirei gawarinai, ana Nonorayauna korotosi si dagui wose kaimasavisi i wose si kinana kairavina, gamosi kaikaponai God si bokabakabari.
Si wona, “Taupauma Bada kana wabai e botubotu wai, God ini gaireni. Nuwanuba sapamai ba Kadara God kurina.”
Pharisee biyisi mutusi koroto kamonai Iesu kurina si wona, “Bi beyebeyena biyim, am Nonorayauna ke wonisi kawasi sina pota.”
I kaobeyisi i wona, “A wonewonim kosi kawasi sina pota wai, saba akima sina parara”.
I botu Jerusalem ku gwabina maranai, i kinana meyagina i kinani, wai kairavina i tou.
I wona, “Kom niko marai awaika nuwanuba ita berim wai kuirina wata kuta yauni. Saba karaku kega rubana matami yai kuna kinani.
Mara ina botu wai, kam abiya sina botu sina gari pipinim, ba sini subibirim, ba sepinai ba seipinai, sina riu beyebeyim.

Kom, ba natunatum am papa kamonai te mamana wai, sina kasi baigoyonimi. Kega kesana akima kana gawarai e mamana wai, sina boterei kana gawarai ina mana. Basuna kom God i botu kurim wai marana kui buruburuvei.”
Damanina, Iesu i riu ku yove taparoro kamona, ba pipiya sibi gimogimona wai, i rukwabina si rukasikasibau.
Kurisi i wona, “God wonana i kirumi i wona, au yove wai pari yovena. Saba komi ko wosei wai pisipisikarisi asi aba kobakoba yovena.”
Marana patepatena yove taparoro kamonai ibi beyebeyena. Saba priest babadisi, ba giu bi beyebeyena biyisi, ba pipiya asi babada asi waina sita kasibunui.
Saba kega keta memena si panani ba sita wosei, basuna pipiya ereonowasi kona wata wonana sibo kikisi.
Mara kesana, Iesu yove taparoro kamonai ibi beyebeyena, ba wara gairena i raumamarei maranai, priest kaikaposi, ba giugiu biyisi Israel asi babada yabata si botu kurina, ba si toirubai si wona,
“Ke wonikai memena bi badana ku yauni wai nikosi wose ke wosewose, kotoi i damaninei?”
Iesu i kaobeyisi i wona, “Yauku yebo ana toirubaimi.
John sapamai bi badana i yauni wai, i babataito kona pipiya karisi yai?”
I kesisi wata kamosi yai si kawapata, ba si wona, “Tana wona sapamai bi badana i yauni wai, ina toirubaita ina wona, awaika kairavina John kega koi geruvei.”
Ba yebo tana wona pipiya karisiyai bibadana i yaunu wai, pipiya ereonowasi akimai sini kasibunuwanita. Basuna kosi si kuiri kata John kona Peroveta kesana.”
Kona kairavina si kaobeyei si wona, “Kega ka kuiri memena bi damaina i yauni.”
Iesu i wona, “Yauku yebo kega ana wonimi kata memena bibadana a yauni wai nikosi wose a wosewose.”

ba boyauna kana marai, ana sabisaibirina kesana i porai aba potapota biyisi kurisi, kata kana koda wine uwana, mutuna sita berei.Saba bao aba potapota biyisi ana saibisaibirina si ravi, ba yaro kabana si pora taveyei i nae.
Sebarena yebo ana saibisaibirina kesana i pora meyei. Saba niko sabisaibirina si ravi, ba si wosei i sinimaya, ba yaro kabana si pora taveyei i nae.
Sebarena kega i boterei, saba ana saibisaibirina yebo kana bi tonu i porai i nae. Saba kosi si ravi ba sinina si purupurukani, ba si garu kasibauvei.”
Damanina wine baona badana i wona, “Awaika ana wosei? Natuku ai nuwayuyauni wai, kona ani porai, memena bage kona sina bokuwayei.”
Ba bao aba potapotaisi natuna si kinani wai, si kao boneyana si wona, “Niko wine baona badana natuna, tana kasibunui, ba niko bao ini karitiyai.”
Damanina wine baona ku kupuna si garu kasibauvei, ba si kasibunui. Wine baona badana awaika kurisi ina wosei?
Ina botu nakosi bao aba potapotaisi ini kasibunuwana, ba wine baona pipiya bausi ina berisi. Pipiya si nonori wai, si wona, “Nikona kega meyana ina tupuwa.”
Iesu totorina kurisi i kinana, ba i toiruba i wona, “God wonawona si kirumi wai mekabage e wonaona? Akima yove bowabowasi si sinikaikaiyei wai, kona akimina, akima kaimasavina damana.
Pipiya ereonowasi kona akimina ku tepana sina peku wai, sini pokipokiyisi. Ba akimina kotoi wata ku tepana ina peku wai, kona pipiyina ina kasi gudagudai.”
Giugiu bitasi ba priest kaikaposi keta si nuveni kata, mekabage ba yagiyagina wata sita patumi. Basuna si kuiri kata niko bi maiba wai kosi kasi sisiya, saba pipiya si nagarisi.
Kona kairavina pipiya bi kae botaina biyisi si maisanisi kata kaena sita botaini. Ba awaika iti sisiyana goyoi wai, Rome kaiwabona ku yarona sita terei.

Damanina bi kae botaina biyisi Iesu si toirubai si wona, “Bai beyebeyena biyim, ka kuiri kata kom awaika kebi sisiyana, ba kebi beyebeyena wai, totorisi wata. Ba kega kesana kotoi kurina ke pekupeku. Kom God ana ketai, ba wona damanai kebi beyebeyena.”
Si wona, “Kuta wonikai Caesar tax kana berei wai, damanina kona kega?”
Iesu i kuiri kata kosi sibi kae bo taina, wai kurisi i wona,
“Silver coin kesana koi beyiku ana kinani.” Ba si beyei i kinani wai, i wona, “Kotoi gubana, ba kana waba niko coin tepanai?”
Ba kosi si kaobeyei si wona, “Caesar.” Iesu kurisi i wona, “Awaika Caesar karinai wai, damanina Caesar ko berei. Ba awaika God karinai wai yebo, God ko berei.”
Awaika debai i sisiyei wai, kega rubana kaena sita botaini. Ba i kaobeyisi wai, si sinimaya ba kawasi si pota.
Ba Sadducee biyisi, duvu kesana, kosi si nosinosi kata pipiya sina rabobo wai, kega sina bomsiri mena. Si botu Iesu kurina ba si toirubai.
Si wona, “Bi beyebeyena biyim, Moses ama giu i kirumi i wona kata maranai, sebare tabitabinena kega ere natunatuna ba ina rabobo wai, tuwateina soberena ina rabai, kata, natunatuna ini tuveisi.”
“Mara kesana, sebasebare asi seven si tupuwa. Sebare iyarokona wasike kesana i rabai, saba kega ere natunatuna, ba sebarena i rabobo.
Ba soberena teina murinai i tupuwa wai, i rabai.
Yebo teisi kasi bi tonu murisiyai yebo i rabai. Ba wosena kesanina i tuputupuwa yepo, sebasebaresi asi seven wasikena kesanina si rabai. Ba saba kega ere natunatusi ba si rabobo.
Ba bokoboina wai wasikena yebo i rabobo.
Sebasebare asi seven niko wasike si rabai. Ba raboraobosi asi bomsiri mena maranai, niko wasike wai kotoi kaowana?”
Iesu i kaobeyisi i wona, “Karaku niko kimta sebasebare ba bibaine te tabitabine.
Saba, pipiya bobo bunagisi God matanai, mara waunai sina bomsiri mena, ba kega meyanai sina tabine.
kosi wai aneya rutainisi, ba kega meyana sina rabobo. Kosi wai God natunatuna, basuna, kosi rabobowai sina bomsiri mena.
Saba Moses dipa kaikarakarasina rurutuvinai i debeina kabitamni, kata raboraobosi si bomsiri mena kairavina i sisiya i wona, “Bada wai kona Abraham ana God, ba Isaac ana God, ba Jacob ana God.
Kona wai pipiya yawayawsisi asi God, kega pipiya raboraobosi asi God. Basuna kona kurina wai, pipiya ereonowasi yawayawasisi.”
Giu bi beyebeyena biyisi mutusi si kaobeyei si wona, “Ku kaobeyena kabitam.”
Damanina ba kega kesana kotoi muri yai i toiruba meyei.
Damanina Iesu i toirubaisi i wona, “Mekabage wai pipiya te wonawona kata, keriso kona David natuna?
Basuna David i kesina Psalm bukana kamonai i wona, BADA GOD au Bada, kurina i wona: Nina kasukuwai ke makira ke mana,
yepo kam abiya ereonowasi kae gaburimi yai, kaem kana aba mamana ana tereisi.
David i wona kata ana Bada Keriso, ba mekabaga wai Keriso, kona David natuna?”
Pipiya ereonowasi sibi taina baenega maranai, Iesu ana Nonorayauna kurisi i wona,

“Ko kita kabitamnimi, kata komi kega giu bi beyebeyena biyisi rutainisi. Kosi asi waina kasi tara sowo veoromisi, tokarukaruvisi sina kote, ba sina yewo neubuwa. Asi waina kata bi gimona gawarisiyai pipiya sina bo kuwayisi, ba sini kaikaivisi. Kosi Jew biyisi asi duwu yovesi yai aba mamana kaimatanisi te binebine ba te makimakira. Ba poraga gawarisi yai wai, kaiwabo asi gawarai te makimakira.
Kosi sobesobere te getawanisi, ba asi sawara, ba asi yove tebi karisi yai. Ba tebi kwarukwaruma wai, asi pari veoroma goyosi te raupari. Kosi pipiyisi wai, asi saroba goyona mom sina yauni.”
Iesu yove taparoro kamonai ibi kinana, ba pipiya marimariyisi, asi puyo, puyo kana ku bo bitaura mena si tereterei.
Ba yebo ibi kinana, ba sobere moyamoyakina kesana i botu, ba penipeni yogiyogisi asi ruwamo i terisi.
Iesu i wona, “Abi suwonimi, niko sobere moyamoyakina, ana puyo i rakata saki i terei. Kega bage pipiya ereonowasi.
Nikosi pipiya ereonowasi, asi mariya nunusiyai, asi puyo si taura. Saba kona wai, ana gomara kamonai, awaika tepanai ita mana wai, ereonowana i terei.”

Iesu ana Nonorayauna mutusi, yove tapaoro si kinani wai sibi wareyei. Kata akima monimonikisi yai, ba pipiya God si puyoi wai, sawarisi yai si sarui wai, kana kinana ibi nuwarubaruba. Saba Iesu i wona,
“Mara e botubotu, kata awaika karaku nina ko kinakinana wai, kega akima kesana wata kana gawarai ina mana, ereonowasi sini garukikirana.”
Ana Nonorayauna si toirubai si wona, “Bi beyebeyena biyim, meo maranai nikosi sawara sina tupuwa, ba abi matakira kana kitai kata nikosi sawara sina dagui sina tupuwa?”

Iesu i kaobeyisi i wona, “Ko kita kabitam, kata pipiya kega sini kwarukwarumimi.” Basuna pipiya pesarisi wabakuwai sina botu sini sisiya, ba sina wona, “Yauku Keriso ba, mara i botu saba kega koni saununurisi.
Maranai abiya, ba pipiya bi badana sini bi gegeyei, warana kona nonori wai, kega kona nagara. Nikosi sawara sina tupuwa, saba mara damona kega ina botu yagiyagina.”
I wona, dam kesana ina bomsiri, ba dam kesana ini abiyei. Ba kupura kesana ina bomsiri, ba kupura kesana ini abiyei.
Dobu ereonowana kamonai, uriyoyo kaikaposi, ba gomara, ba gubaga goyogoyosi sina tupuwa. Ba wose aba naganagarisi, ba matakira kaikaposi, sapamai sina tupuwa.

Nikosi sawara muri yai sina tupuwa. Saba, kainaona komi sina patumimi, ba sini tupa ketowanimi. Ba sina yaunimi kona nae Jew biyisi asi duwu ku yovesi, ba sini kasekase mainimi, ba patuma ku yovesi sina terimi. Ba yauku kairaviku sina botuvimi tautaupauma ba kaikaiwabosi kurisi.
Ba kona maranai wara gairena kurisi koni sisiyei.
Saba, kainaona ko nuwasuya kabitam, kata kega mekabage kona papara meyimi kairavina koni nuwapoya.
Basuna nuwasuya, ba sisiya ana berimi, wai kega kami abiya kesana ini imsi beyei kona ina teresirei.
Tutunumi, ba tuwateiteimi, ba turaturami, ba ami rakaraka damana, kami abiya ku yarosi sina terimi, ba mutumi sini kasi bunuwanimi.
Yauku kairaviku, pipiya ereonowasi sini sinikikiyimi.
Ba kega uyavimi kesana wata, gayamimi yai ina siwana.
Koni imsikikita wai, yawasa mamadamanina kona yauni.
Maranai abiya biyisi kona kinanisi Jerusalem sini bi subibiri wai, kona kuiri kata Jerusalem kasi bi goyonina marana i botu.

Ba pipiya iyabosi Judia kupurinai te mamana wai, sina vera ku koya. Ba iyabosi wata Jerusalem meyagina kamonai te mamana wai, sina kasibau taveyei ba yebo iyabosi matarai te mamana wai, kega sina riu ku kamona.
Kairavina nikona wai, God ana saroba. Peroveta si kirumi wai, ereonowana ina tupuwa.
Kona maranai bibaine manamanavisi, ba bibi susuisi kurisi wai ina goyo saki. Ba nuwapoya kaikapona, ina botu niko ku kupura, ba God ana saroba nikosi pipiya ina berisi.

Ba mutusi seri yai sina rabobo, ba mutusi wai sina patumisi, ba sina yaunisi sina nae dobu bubausi yai sina terisi. Ba God kega si kuiri wai pipiyisi, Jerusalem sina resoresoi yepo, God asi mara rubana i terei wai ina yauni.
Kona maranai, kao ba nawaravi, ba gwamegwame kurisi, matakira bubausi yai sina tupuwa. Ba dobuwai yoyo ini bi garui, ba gugurinai wai, dam ereonowasi sina nagara, ba asi nota ina peku.
Pipiya sina nagara saki, ba sini potapota kata awaika dobuwai ina tupuwa. Kairavina sapama sawarisi sina rugusugusu, ba asi keta sini siwani.
Kona maranai, Sebare Natuna kadara kaikaponai, ba ere maragasina guba kamonai ina botubotu sina kitai.
Nikosi sawara sina dagui sina tuputupuwa maranai wai, ko msiri, ba ko tarakata, basuna ami bai yawasa i neratui.
Damanina ba Iesu niko bimaibai kurisi i sisiya i wona, “Koveya keyamina, ba keyama mutusi, ereonowasi ko kinanisi,
maranai sina dagui sina numonumo wai, ko kuiri kata kwamra i tom.
Kesanina yebo, maranai nikosi sawara kona kinana sina tupuwa wai, kona kuiri kata God ana Basileiya i neratui.
Abi suwonimi, kata nikosi sawara ereonowasi sina tupuwa, ba muri yai niko kimta pipiyisi sina rabobo.
Sapama ba dobu sina momosa, saba wonaku kega meyanai ina momosa.
Ko pota kabitamnimi! kega bikam poragana, ba toma neganega kurisi kona peku saki. Ba kega niko dobu yawasina koni nuwapoyei, ba marana ina botu wai, ini sikwanimi bage riwariwa rutainina.
Kairavina, kona maranai pipiya dobuwai te mamana wai, ereonowasi kurisi ina botu.
Matami sina tamotatara, ba mamanina kona rupari. Kata maragata kona yauni, ba nikosi sawara sina tupuwa wai, ereonowasi kona riubonena, ba Sebare Natuna naonai koni imsiri.”
Iesu mara patepatena, yove tapaoro kamonai ibi beyebeyena. Ba rabisi patepatena, i kasikasibau Olives ku koyana, ba namai i mamana yepo, mara i tomtom.
Ba mamanina, maratom didibarinai, bi taina baenegina kairavina, pipiya ereonowasi si nenae ku yove taparoro mena.
Mara i botu, kata kam kaikapona kana waba, Baisaubona kamna kairavina. Kona maranai wai flour kega yeast yabata te kapukapuni.
Priest kaikaiwabosi, ba giugiu bitasi pipiya si nagarisi kairavina, bibuneyai Iesu kasibunuina ketana si nuvenuveni.
Damanina ba Satan, Iesu ana Nonorayauna kesana, kana waba Judas Iscariot i riuni.
Ba damanina Judas i nae priest kaikaiwabosi, ba yove tapaoro kana aba potapota babadisi yabata si sisiya, kata mekabage Iesu kurisi iti wawanei.
Kosi si nuwagaire saki, ba si damaninei kata, Judas money yai siti maisani.
Judas i damaninei, ba i dagui keta i nuvenuveni, kata kega koroto matasi yai, Iesu ku yarosi ita terei.
Ba Iesu ana Nonorayauna asi ruwamo, Peter ba John i poraisi i wona, “Ko nae kairavita Baisaubona kamna kona bobunagi.”
Saba kosi si toirubai si wona, “Am waina memena kana bo bunagi?”

Iesu i kaobeyisi i wona, “Maranai, meyaga ku kaikapona kona riuriu wai, sebare kesana okowa kiubuna ina kabakabari, ba ina vera beyimi. Ko kibi ko nae meo ku yove ina riuriu wai, kona ku yovena mena.”
Ba yove badana kurina ko wona, bi beyebeyena bitana i wona, “Yauku au Nonorayauna yabata, baisaubona kamna kana kani wai, gawarina memena?”
Kona yovena kamonai, tepana batarinai, gawara kaikapona, ereonowana bobo kepanina ini beyimi. Namai baisaubona kamna ko bobunagi.
Damanina ba si tauya si nae, ba awaika ereonowana Iesu kurisi i sisiyei wai, nanakasike si panani. Ba baisaubona kamna si bobunagi.
Kam maranai, Iesu ana Nonorayauna yabata kam gawarinai si makira,
ba kurisi i wona, “Awaina sakiyei, kata niko baisaubona kamna komi yabata tata kani, ba muriyai siniyara ana paiwarei.
A wonewonimi, niko kam kega ana kanikani yepo, basuna damana God ana Basileiya kamonai, ina tupuwa.”
Iesu vedu i yauni murinai, God kurina i kaikaiwa, ba i wona, “‘Nikona ko yauni, ba i kesimi kamomi yai koi kodei.
Kairavina a wonewomim, vine uwana kega ana tomatomani yepo, God ana Basileiya ina botu.’”

Damanina ba bread i yauni, ba God kurina i kaikaiwa, ba i botomni, ba ana Nonorayauna i berisi, i wona, “Nikona yauku tupuviku, komi kairavimi i berena wai yauku aba nuwa raupairiku kairavina, nikona ko wosei.”
Kambira murinai, wosena kesanina, vedu i yauni, ba i wona, “Niko vedu kona God ana kao baiyoyobana wauna, yauku taraku kamonai, komi kairavimi i tamosewa wai.
Saba ko nonora, pipiya yauku ini wawaniku wai, kona pipiyina karaku nina yabata ka kamkam.
God i wainei kairavina, nanakasike Sebare Natuna ina rabobo. Saba, meo pipiya ini wawanei wai, kona pipiyina saroba goyona mom ina yauni.”
Damanina ba si dagui i kesisi kamosi yai sibi kasekasemaina bibirana, kata kotoi niko wose ita wosei.
Iesu kurisi i wona, “Matara damsi asi taupauma bi badabada bitasi, ba iyabosi bi badana te yuyauna wai, i kesisi te yoreyore meyisi, kata kosi pipiya kuris si gaire saki.
Saba komi kurimi wai, kega nanakasike, komi kamomi yai pipiya kaikapona ina wosei kata kona ini pipiyaikei rutainina. Ba bi badana ina wosei kata, kona saibisaibirina rutainina.
Kata kotoi pipiya kaikapona, pipiya e makimakira ba e kamkam wai kona, pipiya ebo saibira wai? Eee, nao pipiya e kamkam wai kona. Saba, komi kamomi yai wai, yauku kona saibisaibirina kesana.
Au ruruba ereonowasi kamosi yai wai, komi yabata tamsiri.
Ba Tamaku mekabage maragata i beriku ani bada wai, komi yebo, nanakasike maragata ana berimi koni bada.
Kata au Basileiya kamonai wai, komi yauku yabata tana kam, ba tana toma. Ba taupauma asi aba makimakirai kona makira, ba Israel damsi asi twelve koni taupaumisi.”

Iesu i wona, Simon! Simon! Ke nonora! satan God gwabinai bi damanina i yauni. kata ereonowami ina raurubaimi. Goyona, ba gairena kamomi yai ini buburanei, nanakasike bage, baobao bitana wheat e rukosokosovi wai rutainina.
Saba Simon, kom kairavim matapa a rupari, kata am bi geruwana kega ina peku. Ba maranai kuna veramaga mena kuriku wai, tuwateiteim kuna bobi maragasisi.
Saba Simon i kaobeyei i wona, “Bada yauku abo bunaga, kata kom yabata tana nae ku patuma yove, ba tana rabobo.”
Iesu i kaobeyei i wona, “Peter, a wonewonim, karaku, muri yai kokorereko ina tou wai, kom mara tonu kuni gesaira kuna wona, kata kega kukuiriku.”

Damanina ba Iesu ana Nonorayauna i toirubaisi i wona, “Nao maranai, kega money kana kautu, kona wagawaga asi kautu, ba kae sumasuma yabata ai poraimi wai, sawara kesana kobo kabai kona kega?” Kosi si kaobeyei si wona, “kega awaika kesana kabo kabai.”
Iesu i wona, “Saba karaku kotoi wata ere ana money kautuna, kona ere ana wagawaga kautuna wai, ina yauna. Ba kotoi wata karinai seri kega wai, kana tara sowo ini gimonei, ba seri kesana ina gimoni.
Kairavina a wonewonim, peroperoveta kairaviku si kiruma si wona, pipiya goyogoyosi rutainisi ina rabobo. Ba awaika kairaviku si kirukirumi wai, wosena e tuputupuwa.”
Ana Nonorayauna si wona, “Bada ke kinani, nina seri ruwamo.” Iesu i kaobeyisi i wona, “Kona damanina.”
Iesu mamanina i wosewosei wai rutainina, meyaga kaikapona i kasibau taveyei, ba ana Nonorayauna yabata si nae Olive ku koyana.
Ba si verakaibau ku gawarina wai, ana Nonorayauna kurisi i wona, “Ko rupari kata kega ku ruruba kona riu.”
Damanina i sumarisi kega i nae saki, ba i maere sogasoga, ba i rupari.
I wona, “Tama kuna waini wai niko paiwara veduna karikuwai ke yauna taveyei. Saba kega yauku au waina, ba kom am wainai ina tupuwa.”
Ba sapamai aneya i botu, kurina i rerematara, ba ibo bi maragasi.
Iesu nuwayara kaikapo sakina kamonai i rupari, ba poyapoyana tara rutainina ku tano si toitoi.
I raupari yepo, i veramaga maranai wai, ana Nonorayauna nuwapoya i bobunuisi wai, si kenouwapa si dudauwa i kitaisi.
Ba kurisi i wona, “Awaika kairavina ko dudauwa? Ko bomsiri kona rupari, kata kega ku ruruba kamona kona riu.”
Karaku wata ibi sisiya, ba pipiya korotosi, ana Nonorayauna kesana, sebare kana waba Judas, i naovisi wai si verakasibau. Judas i nae Iesu yaonina kairavina,
saba Iesu i toirubai i wona, “Judas, mekabage, kom Sebare Natuna bi yoyaowai kebi wawanei kona?”
Maranai, ana Nonorayauna yabata si mamana wai, si kinani kata awaika ita tupuwa wai si wona, “Bada, ama seri yai kani rauwa kona?”
Ba ana Nonorayauna kesana, priest kaikapona ana saibisaibirina kesana i tarai, ba tainana i tara yaragi.
Saba Iesu i wona, “Damanina niko wose ko boterei!” Ba sebarena tainana i borubai, ba i yawasi.
Damanina priest kaikaiwabosi, ba yove tapaoro kana aba potapota babadisi, ba babada mutusi, si botu sita patumi wai kurisi i wona, “Ko nosi kata yauku kami abiya wai kepata, ba seri yabata ko botu.
Mara patepatena komi yabata yove tapaoro kamonai ta mamana, ba kega ko patumiku. Saba nikona wai ami mara, baidibara ebi kaiwabo wai marana.”
Saba, maranai yove garina basunai keyama si kasiri, ba si makira si mamana wai, Peter i botu ba yabata si makira si mamana.
Ba maranai aba saibisaibira wasikena kesana, keyama yaseganinai Peter i makira i mamana i kinani wai, i botu i kita kabikabitamni. Ba i wona, “Niko sebare yebo kona Iesu yabata si yewoyewo.”
Saba Peter i gesaira i wona, “Wasike, yauku nao sebare kega misi a kuiri.”
Kega rabarabana, ba sebare kesana, Peter i rupanani wai i wona, “Kom yebo pipiyisi kesana.” Saba Peter i kaobeyei i wona, “Sebare, yauku kega yabata!”
Si mana misi rabarabana, ba sebare kesana ikao tupetupena i wona, “Bisuwona’ niko sebare kona Iesu yabata si yewoyewo, basuna kona wai Galilee biyina.”
Saba Peter i kaobeya i wona, “Sebare, awaika ke bisisiyei wai, yauku kega a kuiri.” Peter karaku wata ibi sisiya ba kokorereko i tou.

Damanina Bada i taibira, ba totorina Peter i kitai. Ba Peter nuwanuwana i rupaira kata Bada mekabage kurina i wona, “Karaku niko pominai, muri yai kokorereko ina tou wai, kom mara tonu kuna wona kata kega ku kuiriku.”
Ba Peter i kasibau yove ku matarina, ba i tou saburere.
Ba sebasebare iyabosi Iesu si potapotai wai, si dagui si raviravi, ba si bigigimi.
Matana si kaupotai, ba si wona, “Ke wonikai kotoi i ravim?”
Ba asi sisiya goyogoyosi pesarisiyai si kao bigoyoni.
Mara i tom wai, Israel babadisi, ba priest kaikaiwabosi, ba giu bi beyebeyena bitasi si botu si kesanisi. Ba abiya biyisi Iesu si urabai si botu ba rorititaina naosi yai imsiri.
Ba kosi Iesu si toirubai si wona, “Ke wonikai kom Keriso kona?” Iesu i kaobeyisi i wona, “Komi ana wonimi wai, karaku wata kega koni geruviku,
ba ana toirubaimi wai, memena bage kega kona kaobeyiku.
Saba karaku, ba karaku wata, Sebare Natuna God maragata sakina, kasaunai ina makira ina mana.”
Damanina kosi ereonowasi si toirubai si wona, “Bisuwona kata kom God natuna kona? “I kaobeyisi i wona, “Ko wona kata yauku God natuna.”
Ba kosi si wona, “Kega kesana kotoi awaika ina wonita, ba kota i kesita mom kawanai awaika i sisiei wai ta nonori.”
Damanina ba pipiya duvuna ereonowana si bomsiri, ba Iesu si urabai si nae Pilate kurina.

Ba namai Pilate naonai, si dagui sibi kunumakei. Si wona, “Niko sebare ama dam ibi beyena goyoisi wai, ka panani. Pipiya i wonisi kata, Taupauma Caesar kurina tax kega sini maisa, ba i wona kata kona wai Taupauma Keriso.”
Pilate Iesu i toirubai i wona, “Bisuwona kom Jew biyisi asi taupauma?” Iesu i kaobeyei i wona, “Eee mekabage ku wona wai, damanina nanakasike.”
Pilate priest kaikaiwabosi, ba pipiya korotosi kurisi i wona, “Niko sebare kega kesana ana goyona a panani, ba saroba ata berei.

Saba kosi si kao tupetupena si wona, “Judia kupurina ereonowanai, niko sebare ana bi beyebeyenai, pipiya kamosiyai reso, ba bi rauwa te tuputupuwa. Galilee yai i dagui, ba i botu karaku nikei i verakasibau.”
Maranai, Pilate nikona i nonori wai, i toiruba i wona, “Niko sebare Galilee biyina kona?”
Kona maranai wai, Herod yebo i botu Jerusalem kamonai i mamana. Ba maranai, Pilate i nonori kata Iesu kona ana bibadana kupurinai i botu wai, damania Iesu i porai Herod kurina.

Ba maranai, Herod Iesu i kinani wai, i nuwagaire saki. Basuna warana i nonori, ba niko mara veoromina ibi potapota, kata ana waina mekabage ba ita kinani. Ba ana waina Iesu, matakira ita wose ita kinana.
Herod toiruba pesarisi Iesu i toirubai, saba Iesu kega i kaobeyei.
Priest kaikaiwabosi, ba giu bi beyebeyena bitasi si bomsiri, ba kunumaka kaikapona Iesu si berei.
Ba Herod ana abiyabiyisi yabata Iesu si namei, ba si gigimi, ba gara monimonikina si kotei, ba si porai i veramaga Pilate kurina.
Kona maranai, Herod ba Pilate si kwainana, basuna asi ruwamo wai si abiya katamana.
Pilate pipiya asi babada yabata, ba priest kaikaiwabosi i yorisi si notuwa,

ba kurisi i wona, “Niko sebare ko yauni ko botu kuriku, ba ko wona kata kona pipiya ibi naovena goyoisi.” Saba, nina naomi yai ai kasekasemaini, ba a panani kata kega kesana ana goyona awaika, ba koti kunumakei.
Herod yebo, kega ana goyona kesana i panani kairavina, i porai i veramaga kurita. Karaku nina ko kinani, niko sebare kega kesana awaika i wose goyoi, ba ina rabobo.
Kona kairavina, kana kwapui, ba kana boterei i na nae. (Jew biyisi asi dudura kata, baisaubona kamna maranai patupatumina kesana sini baba wai sina tombauni.)
Damanina koroto tupana si para takuri si wona, “Ko kasibunui! ba Barabas kairavikai ko tombubauni.”
Barabas kona meyaga kaikapona kamonai bi rauwa, ba i kasibunuwa kairavina ku patuma yovena si tere riuwei.
Pilate ana waina kata Iesu ita rubotaveyei ita nae kairavina, koroto kurisi i baba mena.
Saba kosi si para damadamana, si wonawona, “Ko tuparatui! Ko tuparatui!”

Mara kana bi tonuna Pilate kurisi i sisiya i wona, “Awaika kairavina, awaika i wose goyoi? Yauku kega ana goyona kesana a panani, ba ina rabobo. Kona kairavina ana wonisi sina kwapui ba ana boterei i nanae.”
Saba gamosi kaikaponai, si para tupetupena kata, Iesu sita tuparatui, si parapara yepo, Pilate si getawani.
Damanina Pilate asi waina i wosei.
Barabas kairavina si baba wai, patuma yovena kamonai birauwa, ba kasibunuwa kairavina i mamana wai, i botaveyei. Ba Iesu i bere taveyei kurisi, kata awaika si waiwainei wai, kurina sita wosei.

Damanina ba abiyabiyisi Iesu si uraba taveyei. Ba si nenae maranai, sebare kesana kana waba Simon, Cyrene biyina i riuriu ku Jerusalem wai, si panani. Abiyabiyisi si yauni, ba korosi ku tepana si terei, ba si wosei Iesu murinai i yewo si nae.
Koroto kaikapona Iesu si kibi si nae, bibaine mutusi yabata murinai sibi nuwapoya, ba si tou rasarasa, ba si nenae.
Iesu i taibira kurisi, ba i wona, “Jerusalem bibaine! kega kairaviku ko tou, saba komi i kesimi kairavimi, ba natunatumi kairavisi ko tou.
Kairavina, mara e botubotu, ba kona maranai pipiya sina wona, “Saito naki, kata bibaine si kaipoki, ba kega meyana si tuwa kona si tomana.”
Kona maranai, pipiya koya kaikaposi kurisi sina wona, “Ko peku ku tepakai,” ba koya yogiyogisi kurisi sina wona, “Ko sowoikai.”
Kairavina keyama matagina maranai, pipiya nikosi wose sina wose wai, keyama ina maowa maranai wai awaika ina tupuwa?
Abiyabiyisi yebo, sebasebare botabira bitasi asi ruwamo, si urabaisi si kasibau, Iesu yabata, sita kasibunuisi.
Maranai si botu gawara kana waba, Gayamateuteu ku gawarina wai, Iesu namai si tuparatui. Ba botabira bitasi asi ruwamo yebo, kesana kasaunai, ba kesana gedunai, si tuparatuisi.
Iesu i wona, “Tama ke nota taveyisi kairavina kega si kuiri awaika te wosewosei.” Ba kana gara aba binebine si garui ba si kodei.
Pipiya nai simsiri sibi kinana, ba Jew biyisi asi babada Iesu si kao bibisakei. Si wona, “Pipiya mutusi i yawasisi, ba kona Keriso, God i binei wai, mede i kesina i yawasa meyei tana kinani!”
Abiyabiyisi yebo, si botu si namei, ba wine kawasi kwamkarina si yauni si tomani,
ba si wona, “Kom Jew biyisi asi taupauma wai, i kesim ki yawasa meyeim!”
Ba korosi yai, gayamina tepanai nikosi wona si kiruma si wona, “NIKONA JEW BIYISI ASI TAUPAUMA”
Nakoi sebasebare kawakasekasesi nai si roroke wai, kesana Iesu i namei i wona, “Kom Keriso kona? Kom ba yakai ki yawasita!”
Saba, kesana i bomsiri kwainana i yegai i wona, “Kom God ke naganagarei kona kega? Kom ba kona wai, sarobina kesanina ko yuyauni.
Kota saroba ta yuyauni wai i gaire, basuna wose goyogoyosi ta wose kairavina, sarobina ta yuyauni. Saba niko sebare kona kega kesana awaika i wose goyoi.”
Damanina ba i wona, “Iesu am ku Basileiya kuna riuriu wai, kega ki notawapiku.”
Iesu i kaobeyei i wona, “Abi suwonim karaku kom, ba yauku paradaisi yai tana mana.”
Matapa ibi kao basuna, ba kao rarana i boterei, ba baidibara kupura ereonowana i sowopotai. Ba nanakasike i mana yepo 3 o’clock rabisiai.
Ba yove taparoro kamona, garai i tupayaragi wai, garana i tamosika ruwamo si tupuwa.
Ba Iesu gamona kaiponai i para i wona, “Tama ku yarom kanumiku a tereterei.” Nikona i wonei murinai wai, i rabobo.
Ba abiyabiyisi asi bada kesana, niko wose i tupuwa i kinani wai God i bokabakabari ba i wona, “Bisuwona niko sebare wai, kona sebare gairena.”
Pipiya ereonowasi si kesanisi si raugayo, ba niko wose i tupuwa si kinani wai, ere nuwapoyisi nuwanuwasi si botawana ba si veramaga asi ku yove.
Saba pipiya iyabosi Iesu si kuira sakiyei, ba yebo bibaine iyabosi wata Galileeyai si kibi si botu wai, rabarabai naki si imsiri, ba nikosi wose si kinakinana.
Kona maranai wai, sebare kesana kana waba Joseph, rorititaina duwuna kamonai i mamana. Kona wai sebare gairena kesana, ba ana yawasa totorina.

Maranai, Rorititaina si duwu ba niko wose sita wosei wai, kona kega i damaninei. Kona ana meyaga Arimathea, Judia kupurina kamonai, namai i botu. Ba kona wai God ana Basileiya ana botubotuna i potapotai.
I nae Pilate kurina, ba Iesu tupuvina kairavina i baba.
Ba damanina i nae Iesu tupuvina korosi yai i terekirei, ba linen garanai i sumai. Ba karawaga wauna mom, akima nadegubina si karoi. Ba kega kesana kotoi si terei wai, namai i dauwei
Kona kaona wai bobunaga marana ba Sabbath marana matapa ine ratui.
Ba bibaine iyabosi wata Iesu Galilee yai si kibi si botu wai, Joseph yabata si nae ba karawaga si kinani. Ba mekabage wata Iesu tupuvina kamonai si terei wai, si kinani.
Damanina si veramaga asi ku yove, ba Iesu tupuvina kana bane si bobunaga. Ba Bada ana kao tunetune kairavina si bosisiri wai, Sabbath maranai si yakam.
Sabbath murinai maratom didibarinai bibaine si bomsiri bane si bobunaga wai si yauna si sukumara ku karawaga.
Ba si vera kasibau ku karawaga wai, akima kaikapona, karawaga matam ketana si gudui wai, bi bi peuru taveyina si kitai.
Saba si riu karawaga ku kamona wai, Bada Iesu tupuvina kega si panani
Nuwanuwasi i kairagaraga, ba nikona si nuwanuwasuyei maranai, mara kesana sebasebare asi ruwamo kasi gara kwari kadakadarisi parisi yai simsimsiri wai, si kinanisi.
Ba si nagara saki wai, si pepeta naosi yai si gakira ku tano. Saba sebasebaresi kurisi si wona, “Awaika kairavina raoboraobosi kamosi yai, pipiya yawayawasina ko nuvenuveni?
Kona kega nina, kona i bomsiri. Galilee yai awaika i wonimi wai ko nosi?”
I wona, “Sebare Natuna piraga goyo pipiyisi ku yarosi sina terei, ba sina tuparatui. Ba mara bai tonuinai ina yawasa, ba ina bomsiri mena.”
Damanina wonana nuwanuwasi yai i rupaira.
Ba karawagai si veramaga mena wai, nikosi wose ereonowasi, Iesu ana nonora yauna asi eleven ba yebo pipiya mutusi yabata si wonisi.
Bibainesi wai, Mary Magdalene, Joana, ba James sinana Mary, ba yebo bibaine mutusi, nikosi wose Iesu ana Nonorayauna si wonisi.
Saba, Iesu ana Nonorayauna kega si geruvisi. Si nosi kata awaika si sisiyei wai, sisiya paraparaga.

Saba Peter i bomsiri, ba i vera i nae ku karawaga, ba i runoma i kinana wai, kega kesana awaika i kinani. Saba linen garanai Iesu si sumai wai, kona wata i dudauwa wai i kinani. Ba i veramaga mena ku yove, ba awaika i tupuwa wai i nota kabakabai.
Kona maranai, Iesu turaturana asi ruwamo, ketai si yewo si nenae ku Emmaus. Kona meyagina ba ku Jerusalem wai, ana rabaraba nanakasike seven mile rubana.
Ba asi ruwamo wose ereonowasi si tupuwa wai, kosi si bi sisiyana.
Sibi toirubaruba, ba sibi sisiyana maranai, Iesu imsiratu kurisi, ba yabata si yewo si nae.
Kosi si kinani, ba saba si buruburuvei.
Iesu i toirubaisi i wona, “Ami ruwamo awaika kobi kaoboneyanei, ba ko yewoyewo?” Kosi simsiri, ba naosi nuwapoya i bonuwa.
Kesana kana waba Cleopas i toirubai i wona, “Kom wagawagam Jerusalem kamonai, kega ku kuiri rorowa mom awaika i tupuwa kona?”

Iesu i toirubaisi i wona, “Ba awaika i tupuwa?” Kosi si kaobeyei si wona, “Awaika Iesu Nazareth biyina kurina i tupuwa wai. Kona wai, Peroveta, pipiya ereonowasi ba God matasi yai, ana sisiya ba ana wose si maragata saki.
Priest kaikaiwabosi, ba ata babada si yauni, ba pipiya si berisi sita kasibunui, ba korosi yai si tuparatui i rabobo.
Kabi geruvei, kata kona Israel ita tombaubauni. Nikosi wose si tupuwa wai, karaku mara kana bi tonu.
Ba yebo ku tepana kata ama bibaine mutusi si sikwanikai. Karaku maratomai si sukumara ku karawaga,
saba tupuvina kega si panani. Ba si veramaga wai, si wonikai kata, aneya kurisi si rerematara, ba si wonisi kata, Iesu wai yawayawasina.
Damanina turaturakai mutusi si nae ku karawaga, ba mekabage bibaine sisisiya wai, nanakasike si kinani, saba pipiyina kega si kinani.”
Iesu kurisi i wona, “Abi neganegami naki, mekabage wai awaika Peroperoveta si sisiyei wai, kega koi geruwana yagiyaginei.
Bi suwona kata Iesu nikosi wose ina paiwarana, ba ana ku kadara ina riu kona?”
Ba Iesu God wonana ereonowasi, kona i kesina mom kairavina si kiruma wai, i tere bi totorana. Moses ana bukai i dagui, ba i nae Peroperoveta ereonowasi si kiruma wai, kurisi.
Ba si nae matapa ku Emmaus si veravera kasibau wai, Iesu i wosei bage kona ita veravera damana.
Saba kosi si yawatawani si wona, “Kega kuna nae, kao matapa i kakaba, ba matapa e pompom, ke botu yabata tana mana.” Damanina ba i riu yabata sita mana.
Ba si makira sita kam maranai, bread i yauni, God kurina i kaikaiwa ba i kiyatomni, ba i dagui ita berisi.
Kona maranai matasi si tamotatara, ba si kuiri, saba naosi yai i vera siwana.
Si kao boneyana si wona, “Pasinakata kona kairavina ketai kurita i bisisiya, ba God wonana si kirumi wai, kurita ibi debei maranai, nuwanuwata kamosi yai keyama karakarasina rutainina i karakarata.”
Damanina mara kesana si bomsiri, ba si veramaga ku Jerusalem. Ba namai ana Nonorayauna asi eleven mutusi yabata si kesanisi si mamana wai, si pananisi.
Ba kurisi si wona, “Bisuwona Bada i bomsiri! Ba bisuwona Simon kurina i rerematara”
Damanina asi ruwamo awaika ketai kurisi i tupuwa wai, ba mekabage Bada bread i kiyakiyatomni, ba si kita panani wai kurisi si sisiyei.
Karaku wata nikona si bisisiyei, ba Iesu i kesina mom basusi yai i msiri, ba i wona, “Nuwanuba kurimi emana.”
Kosi si sikwana negenegisi, ba si nagara, si nosi bage momosika sita kinani.
Saba kurisi i wona, “Awaika kairavina ko nagara, awaika kairavina ami nota te kairagaraga?
Yaroyaroku ba kaekaeku ko kinana, nikona yauku i kesiku mom, ko borubaiku ba kona kinani, kata momosika kega ere biyosi ba ere sirikesi. Bage karaku nina ko kinakinaniku wai, rutainina.”
Kona i wonisi murinai, yaroyarona ba kaekaena i beyisi.
Nuwagaire i bobunvisi, ba si bi wareyei wai, kega si bi geruwana kabitamni. Kona kairavina i toirubaisi i wona, “Karaku nina komi karimi yai awaika kesana kanina kairavina e mamana kona kega?”
Damanina iyana gibugibuna mutuna si yauni si berei,
ba matasi yai i yauni i kani.

Damanina ba kurisi i wona, “Nikosi wose kairavisi yabata ta mamana maranai, a wonimi. Sawara ereonowana Moses, ba Peroperoveta ba Psalms bukasi, kamosi yai, kairaviku si kiruma wai, wosesi sina tupuwa.”
Damanina asi nota i botatari, kata awaika Peroperoveta si kiruma wai, sita kuira kabitamni.
Kurisi i wona, “Nikasike si kiruma, si wona Keriso sini yara ina paiwarei ina rabobo, ba mara bitonuinai, ina bomsiri mena.
Ba Jerusalem yai sina dagui, nuwabirabira ba piragagoyo nota taveyina kana wabai, dam ereonowasi kurisi sina rumamara.
Komi nikosi wose kasi bi mamatara pipiyimi.
Awaika Tamaku ikao biyoyobanimi wai, ani porai kurimi. Saba meyaga kamonai koni bi potapota yepo, maragata sapamai, ina gakira kurimi.”
Damanina ba ana Nonorayauna Jerusalem yai, i urabaisi si kasibau si nae ku Bethany, ba yaroyarona i bokabara, ba i gairenisi.
Ibi gairenisi maranai, i sumarisi, ba God i yauna taveyei, i gae ku sapama.
Damanina ba ana Nonorayauna si bokabakabari, ba ere nuwagairesi si veramaga ku Jerusalem.
Ba mara patepatena yove taparoro kamonai wata si mamana, ba God sibo kabakabari.
